Name: The Adventures of Alvis
About the game: In the Adventures of Alvis, you play as a boy who discovers that his destiny lies outside the walls of his sleepy village and is somehow connected to the fall of the kings centuries ago... The Adventures of Alvis is an Adventure-RPG-Indie game that is simple yet brimming with personality. Inspired by NES-era classics such as The Legend of Zelda and new Indie favorites alike, the game is easy to pick up and allows the player the freedom to discover on their own. Familiarize yourself with this intriguing world and its countless inhabitants while combating monsters and big, bad bosses. Features: Original 17-song soundtrack The ability to choose how you fight (warrior, wizard, or both) Fast-paced combat that doesn't detach overworld interactions from battles Exciting boss fights An enticing story conveyed slowly and subtly Discoveries to be made Much, much more!
